title: Halloween pumpkin and apple soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', 'flesh of 1 large pumpkin, diced', '2 apples - peeled, cored and chopped', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 pinch dried parsley', '1 low salt stock pot or cube', 'black pepper to taste']
